TestCase.name: testShouldNotEliminatePartitioning4
TestCase.Resource: select a, count (c) from MyTableP group by a

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, project=[a, c], metadata=[]]], fields=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldNotEliminatePartitioning3
TestCase.Resource: select c, b, count (a) from MyTableP group by c, b

Calc(select=[c, b, EXPR$2]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[b, c], select=[b, c, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b, c], select=[b, c, Partial_COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldNotEliminatePartitioning2
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTable group by a, b

SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[forward]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalSortAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[forward]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldNotEliminatePartitioning1
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTable group by a, b

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning4
TestCase.Resource: select a, count (c) from MyTableP group by a, b

Calc(select=[a, EXPR$1]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(c) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning3
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTableP group by a, b

SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[forward]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning2
TestCase.Resource: select b, a, count (c) from MyTableP group by b, a

Calc(select=[b, a, EXPR$2]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning1
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTableP group by a, b

HashAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])
